mapper.update: update reply set reply_contents=#{replyContents} and reply_secret=#{replySecret} where reply_idx=#{replyIdx}
mapper.select: select reply_idx as riplyIdx, reply_contents as replyContents, user_idx as userIdx, board_idx as boardIdx, reply_secret as replySecret, reply_recipient as replyRecipient, reply_date as replyDate from reply where board_idx=#{boardIdx} order by reply_date desc
